-> Backend: Following best industry practices, I created an API that feeds necessary survey data for Accessibility pages.
Designed reusable React (TypeScript) components, reducing code volume by 30% and streamlining codebase refactoring.
Developed and maintained a RESTful API using .NET (C#), ensuring efficient data delivery.
